channel.title: ElevationRSPS - Pk Server || Professional || Flawless Switching
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/adk9cw.png[/img][/CENTER]
[I][SIZE="3"]Welcome to the ElevationRSPS Advertisement Thread. First off we will begin by informing you what you are expecting.
You will be playing a 317 spawn server with a pk points economy. There is dicing and a vote point shop full of rares.
You start off with customizing your character. You later have the option to Choose between the Maxed Level & Hybrid/Melee Package.
[img]http://puu.sh/NAx2[/img]
and a Pure Starter Package
[img]http://puu.sh/NAxf[/img]
Most of your player info is on the quest tab so you can always check it.
[img]http://puu.sh/NAzq[/img]
You can always customize your client by going to the Wrench on the bottom of the screen. There will be another Wrench square, click it. This will appear.
[img]http://puu.sh/NABg[/img]
After you gear up for pking you'll find 3 altars. -Ancients -Lunars -Refill Prayer
You can later proceed by going to the mage book and teleport to the pking spot of your choice.
After getting Pk Points you can buy things from the pk point shop.
[img]http://puu.sh/NAyE[/img]
We have made pking more enjoyable by adding our own unique Bounty Hunter system. A player with a killstreak of 3 or more will be announced globally. The Player that kills him gets the same amount of Pk Points as his streak.
The combat has been tweaked and almost perfected for your enjoyment.
Here is some media. Remember this media was in the BETA version and most things are fixed.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?list=UU87cOzmlBLVU7reZcszaRcw&v=JmvmIguCSLo&feature=player_detailpage]Idk i'm bored - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LiIhevbvs70&feature=player_embedded]ElevationRSPS Mini 1 - YouTube[/url]
Server's Channel: [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/ElevationRSPS/videos]ElevationRSPS - YouTube[/url] We put every player's video up there.
We have daily pk events. It can be a hybrid tournament or a server multi war. You guys name it and staff hosts it! Here is a topic of one of our events. [url=http://elevationrsps.us/forum/index.php?/topic/12-server-tournament-conclusions/#entry31]http://elevationrsps.us/forum/index.php?/topic/12-server-tournament-conclusions/#entry31[/url]
And Something that makes servers the funnest! Clan Activity! [img]http://puu.sh/NAGN[/img]
We have professional paid forums and everything is working perfectly. Join us now!
[url=http://elevationrsps.us/forum/]http://elevationrsps.us/forum/[/url][/CENTER][/SIZE][/I]

item.title: ElevationRSPS - Pk Server || Professional || Flawless Switching
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I suppose the organization is not bad, however, the uniqueness of this server is eh. I do like the forums and the banner.

Read full topic
item.source: ElevationRSPS - Pk Server || Professional || Flawless Switching

item.title: ElevationRSPS - Pk Server || Professional || Flawless Switching
item.dc:creator: @Orel Orel
item.description:
@Orel wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER][/CENTER]

[I][SIZE=“3”]Welcome to the ElevationRSPS Advertisement Thread. First off we will begin by informing you what you are expecting.

You will be playing a 317 spawn server with a pk points economy. There is dicing and a vote point shop full of rares.

You start off with customizing your character. You later have the option to Choose between the Maxed Level & Hybrid/Melee Package.

and a Pure Starter Package

Most of your player info is on the quest tab so you can always check it.

You can always customize your client by going to the Wrench on the bottom of the screen. There will be another Wrench square, click it. This will appear.

After you gear up for pking you’ll find 3 altars.
-Ancients
-Lunars
-Refill Prayer

You can later proceed by going to the mage book and teleport to the pking spot of your choice.

After getting Pk Points you can buy things from the pk point shop.

We have made pking more enjoyable by adding our own unique Bounty Hunter system. A player with a killstreak of 3 or more will be announced globally. The Player that kills him gets the same amount of Pk Points as his streak.

The combat has been tweaked and almost perfected for your enjoyment.

Here is some media.
Remember this media was in the BETA version and most things are fixed.

Idk i’m bored - YouTube

ElevationRSPS Mini 1 - YouTube

Server’s Channel: ElevationRSPS - YouTube
We put every player’s video up there.

We have daily pk events. It can be a hybrid tournament or a server multi war. You guys name it and staff hosts it!
Here is a topic of one of our events.
http://elevationrsps.us/forum/index.php?/topic/12-server-tournament-conclusions/#entry31

And Something that makes servers the funnest!
Clan Activity!

We have professional paid forums and everything is working perfectly.
Join us now!

http://elevationrsps.us/forum/[/CENTER][/SIZE][/I]

Read full topic
item.source: ElevationRSPS - Pk Server || Professional || Flawless Switching
